verses.plain: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.

tokens.t: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.

verses.plain: My help cometh from the LORD, which made heaven and earth.
He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.

tokens.t: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.

verses.plain: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.

tokens.t: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.

verses.plain: The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.

tokens.t: thy shade upon thy right hand.

verses.plain: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.

tokens.t: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.

verses.plain: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

tokens.t: shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

verses.plain: The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.

tokens.t: shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
